forms.title: Contact Us
forms.form_content:
[text* your-name placeholder "Your Name"]

[email* your-email placeholder "Email Address"]

[tel your-phone placeholder "Phone Number (optional)"]

[select your-subject "General Inquiry" "Product Question" "Technical Support" "Partnership Opportunity" "Other"]

[textarea* your-message placeholder "How can we help you? Feel free to include error messages, code snippets, or technical details."]

[file your-attachment limit:5mb filetypes:jpg|jpeg|png|pdf|txt|log]

[checkbox consent use_label_element "I agree to the privacy policy"]

[submit "Send Message"]
forms.mail_template:
Subject: [your-subject]

From: [your-name] <[your-email]>
Phone: [your-phone]

Message:
[your-message]

--
This message was sent from the contact form on TechGear Pro

forms.title: Technical Support
forms.form_content:
[text* customer-name placeholder "Your Name"]

[email* customer-email placeholder "Email Address"]

[text order-number placeholder "Order Number (if applicable)"]

[select product-category "Laptops" "Accessories" "Cables & Adapters" "Gaming" "Smart Home" "Networking" "Storage" "PC Components" "Other"]

[text* product-name placeholder "Product Name or SKU"]

[textarea* issue-description placeholder "Please describe your technical issue in detail. Include error messages, screenshots, or system information if relevant. Example: 'Getting error: Cannot connect to server at 192.168.1.1'"]

[textarea troubleshooting-steps placeholder "What troubleshooting steps have you already tried?"]

[file attachments limit:10mb filetypes:jpg|jpeg|png|pdf|txt|log|xml|json]

[select urgency "Low - General question" "Medium - Issue affecting usage" "High - Product not working" "Critical - Business impacting"]

[submit "Submit Support Request"]
forms.mail_template:
Subject: Technical Support Request - [product-name]

From: [customer-name] <[customer-email]>
Order: [order-number]
Category: [product-category]
Urgency: [urgency]

Issue Description:
[issue-description]

Troubleshooting Attempted:
[troubleshooting-steps]

--
This request was submitted from TechGear Pro Support

forms.title: Product Inquiry
forms.form_content:
[text* your-name placeholder "Your Name"]

[email* your-email placeholder "Email Address"]

[text company placeholder "Company Name (optional)"]

[textarea* product-interest placeholder "What product(s) are you interested in? Include specifications or requirements."]

[select quantity "1-5 units" "6-10 units" "11-50 units" "51-100 units" "100+ units"]

[textarea special-requirements placeholder "Any special requirements? (e.g., 'Need USB-C ports on all sides', 'Must support Linux kernel 5.15+', 'Require <script> tag filtering')"]

[checkbox newsletter use_label_element "Subscribe to our newsletter for deals & updates"]

[submit "Send Inquiry"]
forms.mail_template:
Subject: Product Inquiry from [your-name]

From: [your-name] <[your-email]>
Company: [company]
Quantity: [quantity]

Products of Interest:
[product-interest]

Special Requirements:
[special-requirements]

Newsletter: [newsletter]

--
This inquiry was sent from TechGear Pro

forms.title: Partnership Request
forms.form_content:
[text* contact-name placeholder "Contact Person"]

[email* contact-email placeholder "Business Email"]

[text* company-name placeholder "Company Name"]

[url company-website placeholder "Company Website (https://)"]

[select partnership-type "Reseller/Distributor" "Affiliate Marketing" "OEM/White Label" "Technology Integration" "Co-Marketing" "Other"]

[textarea* partnership-proposal placeholder "Describe your partnership proposal. Include details about your business model, target market, and how we can collaborate. URLs and technical specs welcome."]

[text expected-volume placeholder "Expected Monthly Volume (if applicable)"]

[file business-documents limit:10mb filetypes:pdf|doc|docx|ppt|pptx]

[submit "Submit Partnership Request"]
forms.mail_template:
Subject: Partnership Request - [company-name]

From: [contact-name] <[contact-email]>
Company: [company-name]
Website: [company-website]
Type: [partnership-type]

Proposal:
[partnership-proposal]

Expected Volume: [expected-volume]

--
This partnership request was sent from TechGear Pro

forms.title: Developer API Access
forms.form_content:
[text* developer-name placeholder "Your Name"]

[email* developer-email placeholder "Email Address"]

[text github-profile placeholder "GitHub Profile (optional)"]

[select api-purpose "Personal Project" "Commercial Application" "Research" "Integration Testing" "Other"]

[textarea* use-case placeholder "Describe your use case and what endpoints you need. Example: 'Building inventory management system, need GET /api/products?filter=<category>'"]

[textarea technical-requirements placeholder "Any specific technical requirements or data formats? (JSON, XML, GraphQL, etc.)"]

[number expected-requests placeholder "Expected API requests per day"]

[checkbox terms use_label_element "I agree to the API Terms of Service"]

[submit "Request API Access"]
forms.mail_template:
Subject: API Access Request from [developer-name]

From: [developer-name] <[developer-email]>
GitHub: [github-profile]
Purpose: [api-purpose]

Use Case:
[use-case]

Technical Requirements:
[technical-requirements]

Expected Daily Requests: [expected-requests]

--
This API request was sent from TechGear Pro Developer Portal
